name: Disturbed (itch)
description:
Welcome to Disturbed

The dead doesn't talk. But maybe there ghosts? Discover the drama that happened on that night, question the remaining souls to find the truth. But only if you are ready for it..

Devices :
  •  keyboards
  • controller
Controls :
  • Move: ZQSD
  • Interact: E
  • Switch between worlds: J 
  • Inventory: T
 Details :
  • 3 enigmas 
  • Creepy atmosphere
Credits :

Designed and sound designed by :Antoine PINSON, Ayoub OUAHID, William LAVERGNE

Developped by  : Amaury MEHLMAN, Maxime BRITTO, Nicolas MANACH

Graphics by : Nicolas WILLEM, Faustine ARAGNOU

This game is developed on Unity.
